testcase.name: InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > single inspection timing > calculates timing correctly for single inspection with window end time
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > single inspection timing > calculates timing correctly for single inspection without window end time
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > latest arrival calculation with window end time > calculates latest arrival as windowEnd - preBuffer - inspectionDuration
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > departure time includes post-buffer > departure = inspectionEnd + postBuffer

InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > inspection timing chain > follows correct sequence: arrival -> preBuffer -> inspectionStart -> inspectionDuration -> inspectionEnd -> postBuffer -> departure
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > feasibility check with driving times > skips inspection if earliest arrival would be after latest arrival
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > feasibility check with driving times > includes inspection if arrival is feasible within window
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > inspection without end time > uses windowStart - preBuffer for arrival when no endDateTime
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > edge cases > returns empty array when no inspections found
InspectionPlannerService > timing calculations > edge cases > handles zero buffer times
